title: A proposal, shewing how this nation may be vast gainers by all the sums of money, given to the Crown, without lessening the prerogative humbly offer'd to the King's Most Excellent Majesty, the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, and to the knights, citizens, and burgesses, assembled in Parliament / by William Killigrew ; to which is prefix'd the late Honourable Sir James Sheene's letter on the same subject and the proposer's answer.
author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
